translation.en: [woman 1] I'm about to check my USC decision.
translation.zh: 我就要查我的南加大录取结果了

translation.en: I know it'll be okay if I don't. I saw a lot of people got rejected, so…
translation.zh: 如果没录取也没关系我看到很多人都被拒了

translation.en: I'm already on the page. It says "status update."
translation.zh: 我打开页面了上面说：“状态更新”

translation.en: -[woman 2] "New update." -I clicked it.
translation.zh: -“最新更新”-我点了

translation.en: Okay, status update.
translation.zh: 好 状态更新

translation.en: This is my ultimate dream school.
translation.zh: 这是我的终极梦想学校

translation.en: I'm getting rejected. I already know.
translation.zh: 我要被拒了 我已经知道了

translation.en: I just clicked it. Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 我点了 哦 我的天

translation.en: Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 哦 我的天

translation.en: Wait, I got accepted!
translation.zh: 等等 我被录取了！

translation.en: Oh, my God!
translation.zh: 哦 我的天！

translation.en: -Yeah! -[crying]
translation.zh: 好耶！

translation.en: [woman 3] This is some crazy stuff.
translation.zh: 这件事很离谱

translation.en: Let's talk about this.
translation.zh: 我们来聊一聊

translation.en: There's been a firestorm of news coverage on a sort of college admissions scandal.
translation.zh: 新闻大幅报道了一则大学录取丑闻

translation.en: Explosive details about the largest college admissions scam
translation.zh: 由司法部提起公诉的这起

translation.en: prosecuted by the Department of Justice ever.
translation.zh: 大学录取最大诈骗案曝出惊人细节

translation.en: Our friends are talking about one thing, this story. It's hit a real nerve.
translation.zh: 我们的朋友们都在聊这件事大家都很愤慨

translation.en: [reporter 1] Real estate executives, a lawyer, doctor and a litany of CEOs,
translation.zh: 多名房地产高管、一名律师、医生以及多名执行总裁

translation.en: all facing criminal charges.
translation.zh: 都面临刑事指控

translation.en: [reporter 2] An FBI investigation called Operation Varsity Blues.
translation.zh: 联邦调查局发起了一项调查代号“校园蓝调行动”

translation.en: Operation Varsity Blues.
translation.zh: 校园蓝调行动

translation.en: Operation Varsity Blues.
translation.zh: 校园蓝调行动

translation.en: [reporter 3] How are you after the scandal?
translation.zh: -丑闻之后你境况如何？-你有悔意吗？

translation.en: -[reporter 4] Are you sorry? -[reporter 5] Singer designed the scam
translation.zh: -丑闻之后你境况如何？-你有悔意吗？ 里奇辛格通过其设计的这场骗局敛财上千万美元

translation.en: and collected tens of millions of dollars.
translation.zh: 里奇辛格通过其设计的这场骗局敛财上千万美元

translation.en: [reporter 6] Parents paid him top dollar to pass their kids off as star athletes.
translation.zh: 父母们付给他巨额钱财帮助子女以明星运动员的身份被录取

translation.en: -[reporter 7] Rick Singer. -Rick Singer.
translation.zh: -里奇辛格-里奇辛格

translation.en: -[reporter 8] Rick Singer. -[reporter 9] Rick Singer.
translation.zh: -里奇辛格-里奇辛格 里奇辛格

translation.en: [reporter 11] The mastermind behind the operation.
translation.zh: 操作幕后的策划者

translation.en: [reporter 12] It is sending shockwaves across the country.
translation.zh: 举国为之震动

translation.en: [Singer on phone] The money goes into my foundation as a donation.
translation.zh: 资金作为捐款进入我的基金

translation.en: [John Wilson on phone] To your foundation? Not to the schools.
translation.zh: 哦 进入你的基金？不是给学校？

translation.en: [Singer] Yeah, that way the kids don't know it happens, right?
translation.zh: 是的这样孩子们就不会知道了 对吧？

translation.en: You make a financial commitment.
translation.zh: 你给出金钱承诺

translation.en: What school you want may determine how much that actually is.
translation.zh: 你想进的学校决定了实际金额

translation.en: [Wilson] And so, in terms of things that are more than half million or 300,
translation.zh: 那三五十万

translation.en: what's that set of schools?
translation.zh: 能进什么样的学校？

translation.en: [Singer] So that's, uh, Georgetown, Boston College, Georgia Tech,
translation.zh: 大概是乔治城波士顿学院、乔治亚理工

translation.en: USC, UCLA, Berkeley, you know.
translation.zh: 南加大、加州大学洛杉矶分校伯克利之类的

translation.en: [Wilson] Okay, that's… that's not bad.
translation.zh: 好 那…那还行

translation.en: [Gordon Caplan] She's not a terrific student. She's been testing very badly.
translation.zh: 她不是个出色的学生 成绩很不好

translation.en: [Michelle Janavs] She's smart. She's gonna figure this out.
translation.zh: 她很聪明 她会发现真相的

translation.en: She already thinks I'm up to, like, no good.
translation.zh: 她已经觉得我在搞坏名堂了

translation.en: [Wilson] Uh, is Harvard easier 'cause of legacy? [Singer] No, it's not.
translation.zh: -家里有校友 进哈佛会容易吗？-不会

translation.en: -[Wilson] That doesn't mean shit? -[Singer] Your legacy means zero because…
translation.zh: -那个没用吗？-校友关系完全没用 因为…

translation.en: [Wilson] Unless we're donating to a building, huh?
translation.zh: 除非我们要捐座楼 是吗？

translation.en: [Caplan] I went to Cornell.
translation.zh: 我是康奈尔毕业的

translation.en: I've already given around $750,000 there.
translation.zh: 我已经给他们捐了大概七十五万美元

translation.en: [Singer] Let's be frank, right?
translation.zh: 我们说实话吧？

translation.en: Your 750 is diddly-dink in the world.
translation.zh: 你的七十五万什么都不算

translation.en: I know people who have given $50 million to Cornell.
translation.zh: 我有认识的人给康奈尔捐了五千万美元

translation.en: [Jane Buckingham] Uh, will you send me where and how I should send the check?
translation.zh: 你能把支票的接收方以及寄送方式寄给我吗？

translation.en: [Singer] Oh, yeah. We'll send it so that you get your IRS tax write-off.
translation.zh: 哦 好 我们会寄的这样你能获得国税局的抵税

translation.en: -[Buckingham] Even better. -[Wilson] What if they don't get in?
translation.zh: -那更好-如果他们没能录取呢？

translation.en: [Singer chuckles] You don't have to worry. It's a done deal.
translation.zh: 不 你不用担心 这是必成的买卖

translation.en: [Wilson] Is there a two-for-one special for twins?
translation.zh: 双胞胎有买一送一的优惠吗？

translation.en: [Singer] John, how are you?
translation.zh: 约翰 你好吗？

translation.en: [Wilson] Hey, Rick. You're pretty busy these days, huh?
translation.zh: 嘿 里奇 你最近很忙吧？

translation.en: Yeah, we got early decision coming up.
translation.zh: 是的 提前录取阶段就要到了

translation.en: So, hey, I do wanna talk a bit about your pricing strategy and economic model.
translation.zh: 我想聊一聊你的定价策略和经济模式

translation.en: Uh…
translation.zh: 呃…

translation.en: I don't wanna force it on you, but I just think it could be helpful.
translation.zh: 我不想强迫你但我觉得应该会有帮助

translation.en: No, no, uh, yeah.
translation.zh: 没关系 好的

translation.en: I have a bunch of schools that we work with directly
translation.zh: （部分对话考虑时间和清晰性进行了合并或修改） 我有直接合作的学校 先到先得

translation.en: and, you know, it's kind of a first come, first served.
translation.zh: 我有直接合作的学校 先到先得

translation.en: So… pick a place you wanna go.
translation.zh: 所以…选一所你想去的学校

translation.en: So, if you said Harvard
translation.zh: 如果说是哈佛

translation.en: or Princeton or Georgetown, you know, one of those things.
translation.zh: 普林斯顿或者乔治城这种

translation.en: Well, if you wanna use my side door at Harvard, it's about $1.2 million.
translation.zh: 如果你想用我在哈佛的旁门大约要一百二十万美元

translation.en: Jesus.
translation.zh: 老天啊

translation.en: But if you wanna go through the back door, Harvard's asking for $45 million.
translation.zh: 但如果你想走后门哈佛要价四千五百万美元

translation.en: -God. -Stanford's asking for $50 million.
translation.zh: -天啊-斯坦福要价五千万美元

translation.en: -Wow. -And they're getting it.
translation.zh: -哇-有人愿意出这笔钱

translation.en: That's the crazy thing.
translation.zh: 这才吓人

translation.en: They're getting it from the Bay Area and New York.
translation.zh: 湾区和纽约有人愿意付钱

translation.en: John, this is how crazy it's gotten.
translation.zh: 约翰 就是这么疯狂

translation.en: I'm gonna do over 730 of these side doors this year.
translation.zh: 我今年会用到730多个旁门

translation.en: [Wilson] Wow. And how many schools are you doing those at now?
translation.zh: 哇 你和多少学校有这种合作？

translation.en: Just like the top 20 or 50 or…
translation.zh: 像是排名前20、50或者…

translation.en: [Robert Fisher] I've done a lot of wiretaps over the years.
translation.zh: 这些年我做了很多窃听工作

translation.en: It truly is amazing sometimes what people will say on the phone
translation.zh: 在不知道有联邦特工窃听的情况下 人们在电话里说的话真的很惊人

translation.en: when they don't know that the feds are listening.
translation.zh: 人们在电话里说的话真的很惊人 （前联邦检察官 罗伯特菲舍）

translation.en: I know. I know. It's craziness. I know it is.
translation.zh: 我知道 很疯狂 （加州 洛杉矶）

translation.en: Then I need you to get him into USC, and then I need you to cure cancer,
translation.zh: 那我要你帮他进南加大还要你治愈癌症

translation.en: and, oh, make peace in the Middle East.
translation.zh: 哦 还有实现中东和平

translation.en: I could do that.
translation.zh: 我可以

translation.en: I could do that if you figure out a way to boot your husband out
translation.zh: 如果你能想办法赶走你丈夫

translation.en: so that he treats you better.
translation.zh: 让他对你好点 我就能做到

translation.en: [woman] That's impossible. That is impossible.
translation.zh: 那不可能

translation.en: [Fisher] The government did a wiretap on Rick's phone. He didn't know.
translation.zh: 政府窃听了里奇的电话 他不知情

translation.en: He was intercepted talking to many people.
translation.zh: 他和很多人的对话都被拦截了

translation.en: Every working mom comes to me and says, "How do I do it all?"
translation.zh: 每个职场母亲都来问我“我要如何把一切都做好？”

translation.en: Well, guess what? You can't.
translation.zh: 你知道吗？不可能的

translation.en: There aren't many federal cases where you have 50 people indicted for a crime.
translation.zh: 很少有联邦案件涉及50人被指控犯罪

translation.en: So we're trying to get ourselves, like, a 34 on the ACT.
translation.zh: 我们尽量要在ACT考试拿到34分

translation.en: [woman] Yeah. Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: [Singer] So Mark will do that. Really could be a 33.
translation.zh: 马克会搞定 真的可能会是33分

translation.en: -Could be a 34. Could be a 35. -[woman] Right.
translation.zh: -可能是34分 也可能是35-好

translation.en: [Singer] Can you get me a handwriting sample?
translation.zh: 你能给我一份字迹样本吗？

translation.en: -[woman] Yep. -And a signature sample.
translation.zh: -好的-还有签名样本

translation.en: -So we can get kinda close. -[woman] Yes.
translation.zh: -这样我们能尽量模仿-好

translation.en: [Daniel Golden] Rick Singer was the independent counselor
translation.zh: 里奇辛格是一个独立顾问

translation.en: who orchestrated the wrongdoing in Operation Varsity Blues,
translation.zh: 他主导了校园蓝调行动中的恶行

translation.en: and the court documents indicate that it started in 2011.
translation.zh: 法庭文件显示 恶行始于2011年

translation.en: My own research into Singer's life and career
translation.zh: 我对辛格人生与职业的调查显示… （《录取的代价》作者丹尼尔戈登）

translation.en: indicates that, on a smaller scale,
translation.zh: （《录取的代价》作者丹尼尔戈登） …在那之前几十年里他就已经有小规模的欺诈行为了

translation.en: he was deceptive for decades before that.
translation.zh: …在那之前几十年里他就已经有小规模的欺诈行为了

translation.en: [Margie Amott] I'd like to think Rick started out
translation.zh: 我愿意认为里奇一开始是想走专业合法的路线的

translation.en: trying to be professional and trying to be legitimate.
translation.zh: 我愿意认为里奇一开始是想走专业合法的路线的 （教育顾问 玛吉阿莫托）

translation.en: For a number of years, Rick was the go-to person.
translation.zh: 很多年来里奇都是受大家依赖的专业人士

translation.en: He was the only one in town who did this sort of thing.
translation.zh: 他是城里唯一干这行的人

translation.en: If you wanted information about college admissions, you went to Rick.
translation.zh: 如果你需要大学录取的信息就去找里奇

translation.en: I think people were eager to use him. They were excited.
translation.zh: 人们很愿意找他 大家很兴奋

translation.en: They were impressed and thought, "Wow, he knows the formula."
translation.zh: 他们赞叹道“哇 他很懂里面的门道”

translation.en: "He knows the rules. He has the key to the game."
translation.zh: （大学顾问 帕崔沙菲斯） “他了解比赛的关键”

translation.en: [Akil Bello] If you're a well-to-do parent in a school with 500 seniors,
translation.zh: 如果你是一个富裕的家长孩子所在的高三年级有500人

translation.en: your child is getting a fraction of the attention you want them to get.
translation.zh: 孩子得到的关注远不如你所期望的多

translation.en: So you do what you do. You apply money to the problem.
translation.zh: 那你就尽己所能 花钱解决问题

translation.en: You find somebody who will independently help just your child,
translation.zh: （备考专家 阿吉尔贝罗） 找到可以独立帮助你孩子的人帮他们度过这个阶段

translation.en: and help them through this process.
translation.zh: 找到可以独立帮助你孩子的人帮他们度过这个阶段

translation.en: And that's sort of the genesis of an independent college counselor.
translation.zh: 这差不多就是独立大学顾问的起源

translation.en: My parents said, "We're hiring an independent college counselor
translation.zh: 我父母说“我们雇了一位独立大学顾问

translation.en: who can help give you a little guidance on SAT prep,
translation.zh: 可以帮忙指导你备考SAT… （里奇辛格前客户亚历山德拉比林）

translation.en: and help narrow your focus for the colleges you're interested in."
translation.zh: …帮你缩小感兴趣的高校的范围”

translation.en: "He'll be a presence in your life for the foreseeable future, until college applications are in."
translation.zh: “到收到大学录取通知为止他都会陪伴你”

translation.en: [Golden] I believe there were many students he worked with who had very good credentials,
translation.zh: 我相信与他合作的很多学生学习背景都很好

translation.en: and he performed the normal services of a counselor
translation.zh: 他为他们供了正常的顾问服务

translation.en: and facilitated their admission to college
translation.zh: 给他们的申请书、推荐信等提建议

translation.en: by advising them on their essays or their recommendations and so on.
translation.zh: 帮助他们被大学录取

translation.en: He was the go-to college counselor at that time.
translation.zh: 需要大学顾问的人都找他那时这种资源并不多

translation.en: Back then, there weren't many resources.
translation.zh: 需要大学顾问的人都找他那时这种资源并不多 （里奇辛格前客户）

translation.en: He had this company called Future Stars. I had many friends that used him.
translation.zh: 他有一家公司叫未来之星我有朋友雇佣过他

translation.en: It was one of those things where you had to do it.
translation.zh: 这就是那种你必须要做的事

translation.en: If you didn't, you'd regret it and worry about,
translation.zh: 如果不做 你就会后悔、担心

translation.en: "Did I get into where I wanted to go? Could I have gotten in if I'd used him?"
translation.zh: “我进了想进的学校吗？如果我用了他是不是就被录取了？”

translation.en: He always dressed like he had just come from the basketball court.
translation.zh: 他的着装总是像刚从篮球场出来

translation.en: [Patricia Fels] His idea was that what he was doing was coaching kids for getting into college,
translation.zh: 他的想法是 他所做的就是像教练一样指导孩子们进入大学

translation.en: so therefore he dressed like a coach.
translation.zh: 因此他打扮成教练的样子

translation.en: [Amott] He used to walk around in his athletic clothes,
translation.zh: 他以前总是穿着运动服四处走动

translation.en: and his little monk hairdo.
translation.zh: 剃着僧人头

translation.en: He wasn't necessarily charismatic.
translation.zh: 他不是很有魅力

translation.en: Didn't crack a lot of smiles. Was pretty serious.
translation.zh: 不苟言笑 很严肃

translation.en: Very shrewd. Businesslike.
translation.zh: 非常精明 干练利索

translation.en: He didn't chat much. He wasn't very personable.
translation.zh: 他不怎么闲聊 不太随和

translation.en: There are people you meet who feel like they have this vibrating tension
translation.zh: 有些人会让人觉得在他们的外表之下

translation.en: right under the surface all the time, and he was like that.
translation.zh: 一直有十分紧张的情绪他就是那种人 说：“是 我明白”

translation.en: [Amott] Rick was always drumming up business.
translation.zh: 里奇总是在开拓新生意

translation.en: He was always giving presentations at Borders, at the country clubs.
translation.zh: 他总在博德斯书店和乡村俱乐部演讲

translation.en: And I also knew what his presentations entailed,
translation.zh: 我知道他的演讲都是些什么内容

translation.en: and they were promises that he couldn't keep and… lies.
translation.zh: 都是他无法实现的诺言 以及…谎言

translation.en: [Fels] I would hear some stories from kids that made me think
translation.zh: 我听到一些孩子们说起的故事

translation.en: that he was a little bit fishy.
translation.zh: 让我觉得他有点可疑

translation.en: A little bit slimy.
translation.zh: 有点狡诈

translation.en: I have one acquaintance who said that Rick started offering him,
translation.zh: 我有个熟人说 里奇开始跟他说

translation.en: "Hey, I could potentially get you into this school
translation.zh: “嘿 我可以让你进入这所学校

translation.en: for a certain amount of money."
translation.zh: 只要花一笔钱”

translation.en: [Golden] Almost from the beginning,
translation.zh: 几乎从一开始

translation.en: Rick Singer was cutting corners, at least in a small way.
translation.zh: 里奇辛格就在投机至少是玩些小花招

translation.en: The word I got from people who knew him in Sacramento
translation.zh: 我听萨克拉门托认识他的人说

translation.en: was he was exaggerating and fabricating on kids' applications.
translation.zh: 他会夸大、伪造孩子们的申请材料

translation.en: You know, changing their race from white to Latino
translation.zh: 把种族从白人改成拉丁裔

translation.en: or African American so that they could qualify for affirmative action.
translation.zh: 或者是非裔美国人让他们享受平权福利

translation.en: I mean, he was quite brazen.
translation.zh: 他毫无顾忌

translation.en: Because I was always suspicious of Rick Singer, I started to keep a file.
translation.zh: 因为怀疑里奇辛格我保存了一份资料

translation.en: I started copying things off his website.
translation.zh: 我开始复印他网站上的内容

translation.en: "The Singer Group has developed into one of the US's most successful
translation.zh: “辛格集团发展成为了美国最成功的

translation.en: life coaching and consulting businesses."
translation.zh: 人生指导和咨询公司之一”

translation.en: "Within a year, operations launched in Singapore, Bangkok,
translation.zh: “一年内 在新加坡、曼谷

translation.en: Philippines, China, Japan and Korea."
translation.zh: 菲律宾、中国日本和韩国推出了业务”

translation.en: Rick Singer was frequently telling lies about his resume.
translation.zh: 里奇辛格经常伪造自己的简历

translation.en: Somebody told me that he pretended he'd been a board member of Starbucks.
translation.zh: 有人告诉我说他假装自己曾是星巴克的董事会成员

translation.en: The more he got away with it, the more he did it.
translation.zh: 没被识破的次数越多他就越是肆无忌惮

translation.en: [reporter 1] We're still on the preliminary part of the case.
translation.zh: （康州 格林尼治18年6月15日） 案件还在初步阶段

translation.en: But both indictments brought against him were incredibly detailed.
translation.zh: 针对他的两项指控都极为具体

translation.en: -There appears to be a lot of evidence… -Yeah.
translation.zh: -有很多证据显示…-喂

translation.en: [Singer on phone] Is this Gordon Gekko of Wall Street?
translation.zh: 是华尔街的戈登盖柯吗？

translation.en: No, it's Gordon Caplan. How are you?
translation.zh: 不 我是戈登卡普兰 你好吗？

translation.en: I'm just kidding with you. How you doing?
translation.zh: 我开玩笑呢 你好吗？

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah. Good.
translation.zh: 嗯 我很好

translation.en: [reporter 2] Corporate deal lawyer Gordon Caplan,
translation.zh: 企业并购律师戈登卡普兰

translation.en: a partner at the law firm of Willkie Farr & Gallagher.
translation.zh: 威尔基法尔和加拉格尔律师事务所的一位合伙人

translation.en: [Caplan] The US tax system has two fundamental components
translation.zh: 美国税务系统有两大基础部分

translation.en: which makes this somewhat alluring.
translation.zh: 这就让它有点诱人

translation.en: My wife has told me a little bit about what you guys do.
translation.zh: 我妻子跟我说了一点你们在做的事

translation.en: Uh, could… could you just give me a little bit of background?
translation.zh: 呃 能不能…你能不能跟我说一下背景？

translation.en: [Singer] Okay. So, who we are.
translation.zh: 好 那先说说我们是谁

translation.en: We are a $290 million company that I own,
translation.zh: 我的这家公司市值两亿九千万美元

translation.en: with a thousand employees across the US, 280 internationally.
translation.zh: 有一千名员工遍布全美280名海外员工

translation.en: We help the wealthiest families in the US get their kids into school.
translation.zh: 我们帮助美国最富有家庭的孩子们入学

translation.en: We have every NBA owner, every NFL owner.
translation.zh: 我们认识所有NBA职业篮球协会和NFL职业榄球联盟的球队老板

translation.en: We've got everybody.
translation.zh: 我们有各种人脉

translation.en: Now, these families, they want guarantees.
translation.zh: 这些家庭想获得保证

translation.en: They don't wanna be messing around.
translation.zh: 他们不想浪费时间

translation.en: They want this thing done. So they want in at certain schools.
translation.zh: 他们希望把事情办成送孩子进入特定的学校

translation.en: So I've done 761, what I would call, "side doors."
translation.zh: 我拓展了761扇我所谓的“旁门”

translation.en: The "front door" means getting in on your own.
translation.zh: “前门”是指靠自己进去

translation.en: The "back door" is making a donation, which is ten times as much money.
translation.zh: “后门”则是靠捐款需要的金额会翻十倍

translation.en: I've created this kind of side door in
translation.zh: 我开辟这种旁门

translation.en: because with the back door, there's no guarantee.
translation.zh: 是因为后门没有保障

translation.en: They're just gonna give you a second look.
translation.zh: 他们只是会多考虑你一下

translation.en: My families want a guarantee.
translation.zh: 我的客户家庭们需要保障

translation.en: [officer] I'm a special agent with the FBI.
translation.zh: （书面陈述 19年3月11日） 我是联邦调查局特别探员

translation.en: I'm currently part of a squad that investigates economic crimes,
translation.zh: 我现在正在一个小队中调查经济犯罪

translation.en: including various forms of corporate fraud, securities fraud and bribery.
translation.zh: 包括各种形式的企业诈骗、证券诈骗和贿赂

translation.en: The facts in this affidavit come from my personal involvement
translation.zh: 这份书面陈述中的事实来自我个人

translation.en: with this investigation.
translation.zh: 参与调查的经历

translation.en: Hi, my name is Rick Singer, and I'm the founder of The Key.
translation.zh: 你好 我叫里奇辛格我是钥匙公司创始人

translation.en: [officer] Rick Singer founded and operated The Key,
translation.zh: 里奇辛格创建并经营的钥匙公司

translation.en: a for-profit college counseling and preparation business.
translation.zh: 是一家营利性大学咨询和备考公司

translation.en: He also founded The Key Worldwide Foundation,
translation.zh: 他还创立了钥匙全球基金会

translation.en: a non-profit corporation that is exempt from paying federal income tax.
translation.zh: 一家不必缴纳联邦收入税的非营利性组织

translation.en: Rick Singer told parents that he could facilitate their children's admission
translation.zh: 里奇辛格告诉家长们他可以通过他所谓的“旁门”

translation.en: via what he termed "the side door,"
translation.zh: 帮助孩子们入学

translation.en: a special arrangement in which the parents would make a donation to his foundation
translation.zh: 方式就是让家长给他的基金会捐款

translation.en: to conceal the fact that they were bribe payments.
translation.zh: 掩盖这是贿赂赃款的事实

translation.en: Between approximately 2011 and 2018,
translation.zh: 大约在2011年到2018年之间

translation.en: parents paid Singer approximately $25 million
translation.zh: 家长们付给辛格约两千五百万美元

translation.en: to bribe coaches and university administrators.
translation.zh: 用以贿赂教练和大学管理人员

translation.en: This is America. Like, you got money?
translation.zh: 这就是美国 你有钱吗？

translation.en: Best believe you have access to certain spaces that other kids don't have.
translation.zh: 那你就可以去其他孩子去不了的地方

translation.en: So I'm… I'm really not surprised…
translation.zh: 所以我…我并不惊讶…

translation.en: [Jon Reider] Over the last three or four decades,
translation.zh: 在过去三四十年间

translation.en: higher education has become increasingly a commodity.
translation.zh: 高等教育越来越像一种商品 （前斯坦福招生工作人员乔恩莱德）

translation.en: Something that you purchase. A product.
translation.zh: （前斯坦福招生工作人员乔恩莱德） 是你可以购买的产品

translation.en: It's a goal in and of itself, rather than the goal being to get an education.
translation.zh: 入学本身成了一种目标受教育反而不再是目的

translation.en: It's become a status point.
translation.zh: 它成为了一种地位加分

translation.en: Your status has now increased
translation.zh: （独立教育顾问 芭芭拉卡慕斯） 如今你的地位会因为孩子就读于精英学校而上升

translation.en: because your child is at what's called an "elite institution."
translation.zh: 如今你的地位会因为孩子就读于精英学校而上升

translation.en: It's all about bragging rights.
translation.zh: 一切都是为了吹嘘的资本

translation.en: The running line in our industry is like, "The parents are applying to college."
translation.zh: 我们行业的常见观点是“申请大学的是父母” （独立教育顾问 佩里卡慕斯）

translation.en: "The kid is the vehicle through which they apply to college."
translation.zh: “孩子是他们申请大学用的道具”

translation.en: If you're a freshman, I'm sorry,
translation.zh: 如果你是新生 抱歉

translation.en: because you are gonna be thrown into a world where they're gonna be like,
translation.zh: 因为你将被扔进一个这样的世界

translation.en: "College, college, college."
translation.zh: “大学、大学、大学”

translation.en: "Go to college. You have to get the best grades."
translation.zh: “你要拿最好的成绩”

translation.en: "If you're not, you're gonna feel like a failure. You're the worst."
translation.zh: “不然你就会感觉像个失败者你是最差的”

translation.en: If you're a parent and you didn't go to Harvard,
translation.zh: 如果你是个没念过哈佛的父母

translation.en: this is your chance to now go to Harvard, right? In your warped mind.
translation.zh: 在你扭曲的观念里现在这就是你上哈佛的机会

translation.en: [Bello] It's typically accepted that Ivy League institutions
translation.zh: 人们广泛认为常青藤联盟学校

translation.en: are the "best" in the country.
translation.zh: 是所谓全国“最好”的

translation.en: But all of those differences have almost nothing to do
translation.zh: 但学校之间的差异

translation.en: with the academics of the institution.
translation.zh: 和学术毫无关系

translation.en: U.S. News started ranking colleges in the '80s,
translation.zh: 《美国新闻》从80年代开始给大学排名

translation.en: based on one criteria: prestige.
translation.zh: 标准只有一个：名望

translation.en: That's it. [chuckles] That's it.
translation.zh: 仅此而已

translation.en: "Prestige" is actually a French word.
translation.zh: 名望其实是个法语词

translation.en: In the original French, it means something people don't realize.
translation.zh: 原本在法语中它指人们不会意识到的事物

translation.en: It means "deceit."
translation.zh: 是欺骗的意思

translation.en: That's what prestige is in the college.
translation.zh: 大学的名望就是这样的东西

translation.en: It's imaginary. It's an illusion. Yet people believe in it.
translation.zh: 它是虚构的 是幻影 但人们相信它

translation.en: It's not just population growth that makes it harder to get into colleges today.
translation.zh: 如今的大学入学之难不仅由人口增长造成

translation.en: The colleges themselves have brought it about.
translation.zh: 大学本身也导致了这一结果

translation.en: Because the more selective they look on paper, the higher ranked they are.
translation.zh: 大学对文书越挑剔 排名就越高

translation.en: Everything these schools are doing is massaging to try and up the rankings.
translation.zh: 这些学校所做的一切都是在千方百计提高排名

translation.en: And it's a really dangerous game.
translation.zh: 这是场危险的比赛

translation.en: [Golden] Most people see college admissions,
translation.zh: 多数人认为大学录取

translation.en: "Oh, it's based on merit except for affirmative action for minorities."
translation.zh: “除了少数群体平权措施外其他都是看成绩的”

translation.en: My view of the admissions process is all sorts of different preferences,
translation.zh: 我认为录取流程就是各种形式的偏袒

translation.en: with, yes, some students getting in on pure merit,
translation.zh: 当然 有的学生完全是靠成绩录取

translation.en: but many others getting in due to preferences that skew rich and white.
translation.zh: 但还有很多学生能入学靠的是向富人和白人倾斜的偏袒

translation.en: One is by preferences for students who play niche sports,
translation.zh: 其中之一是对参与小众运动学生的偏好

translation.en: like sailing or fencing or horseback riding,
translation.zh: 比如帆船、击剑或是马术

translation.en: which most kids never get a chance to try.
translation.zh: 大部分孩子根本没有机会尝试

translation.en: Then there's making a huge donation to a university.
translation.zh: 另外一种就是给大学巨额捐款

translation.en: That gets them noticed by the fundraising office,
translation.zh: 筹款办公室会注意到他们

translation.en: which will recommend the candidate to admissions.
translation.zh: 会推荐候选人被录取

translation.en: Jared Kushner was the son of a very wealthy real estate developer
translation.zh: 杰雷德库什纳是一个非常富有的房地产开发商的儿子

translation.en: in New Jersey.
translation.zh: 来自新泽西

translation.en: At the time Jared was applying to college,
translation.zh: 杰雷德申请大学时

translation.en: his father pledged $2.5 million to Harvard,
translation.zh: 他父亲向哈佛许诺了二百五十万美元

translation.en: and Jared was admitted to Harvard,
translation.zh: 然后杰雷德被哈佛录取了

translation.en: even though by all accounts he was an average student
translation.zh: 虽然据大家所说 他是个平庸的学生

translation.en: who wasn't necessarily taking the toughest courses in his high school.
translation.zh: 在高中时没有选学最难的课程

translation.en: A lot of the colleges won't actually guarantee the admission,
translation.zh: 很多大学不会保证录取

translation.en: which is interesting.
translation.zh: 这很有意思

translation.en: So you might write a check for $3 million, and the kid could be rejected.
translation.zh: 你签下一张三百万美元的支票孩子还是可能被拒收

translation.en: If you're not writing a $10 to $20 million dollar check,
translation.zh: 如果你不写一张一两千万美元的支票

translation.en: it doesn't move the needle enough for them.
translation.zh: 都不足以让他们动容

translation.en: [Golden] Singer didn't demand the kind of money that is required today
translation.zh: 辛格要的钱并没有如今这么高

translation.en: if you want to absolutely guarantee your kid's gonna get in.
translation.zh: 就能保证把你的孩子送入大学

translation.en: You know, these parents paid Singer $300,000, $400,000, $500,000.
translation.zh: 这些家长付给辛格三十到五十万美元

translation.en: What he sold and what they bought
translation.zh: 他出售给这些家长的

translation.en: was essentially a certainty of admission at a bargain basement price.
translation.zh: 是便宜的确保入学产品

translation.en: So I'm gonna make him a kicker.
translation.zh: 我要让他成为一名橄榄球踢球员

translation.en: He does have strong legs. Maybe he'll become a kicker.
translation.zh: 他双腿确实很健壮也许他能成为踢球员

translation.en: -You never know. -Yeah. Absolutely.
translation.zh: -谁知道呢-没错

translation.en: You could inspire him, Rick.
translation.zh: 你可以鼓励他

translation.en: You may actually turn him into something. I love it.
translation.zh: 你可以让他有所成就 我喜欢

translation.en: [chuckles] Yeah. I know.
translation.zh: 是 我知道

translation.en: -Bill McGlashan, good to see you. -Nice to be here.
translation.zh: -比尔麦格拉申 幸会-很高兴能来到这里

translation.en: TPG Growth is a firm people don't know that much about.
translation.zh: TPG成长是一家大众不太了解的公司

translation.en: [reporter] TPG Growth is the $4 billion growth arm of the private equity giant TPG Capital.
translation.zh: TPG成长是私募股权巨头TPG资本价值四十亿的成长资本

translation.en: The more successful the business is, the more impact you're creating.
translation.zh: 公司越成功 就能创造越大的影响力

translation.en: You get the virtuous benefits of sustainable, scalable capitalism at work.
translation.zh: 你会获得可持续、可扩张的资本优势

translation.en: [Singer] Last year I had a boy, I made him a long snapper.
translation.zh: 去年我让一个男孩成为了长开球手 顺利入学

translation.en: I love it.
translation.zh: 我喜欢

translation.en: He was 145 pounds. Long snapper.
translation.zh: 他体重65公斤 长开球手

translation.en: [chuckles] So what I'll probably need is,
translation.zh: 我需要的东西是

translation.en: if you guys have any pictures of him playing multiple sports,
translation.zh: 如果你们有他参与各种运动的任何照片

translation.en: that will be helpful, because I will photoshop his face onto a kicker.
translation.zh: 那会很有用 因为我会把他的脸通过修图放到一个踢球手身上

translation.en: [chuckling] Okay. Okay, let me look through what I have.
translation.zh: 好的 我会找找看

translation.en: Pretty funny the way the world works these days, it's… unbelievable.
translation.zh: 如今世界运转的方式很有意思…难以置信

translation.en: [reporter] Devin Sloane, he's a California businessman, an executive.
translation.zh: 德文斯隆是个加州商人 高管

translation.en: We've had the good fortune of knowing you
translation.zh: 我们非常幸运能认识你们

translation.en: and sharing smiles and joy and laughter together.
translation.zh: 一同分享笑容、喜悦和欢声笑语

translation.en: [Singer] Last year, I had a boy who did the water polo.
translation.zh: 去年我这里有个打水球的男孩

translation.en: When the dad sent me the picture, he was too high out of the water.
translation.zh: 他爸爸把照片发给我 我一看他在水面之上的位置太高了

translation.en: Nobody would believe anybody could get that high.
translation.zh: 没人会相信有人能到那么高的位置

translation.en: [McGlashan] Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: [Singer] So I told the dad, I said,
translation.zh: 所以我跟那位爸爸说“怎么回事？”

translation.en: "What happened?" He said, "He was standing on the bottom."
translation.zh: 他说：“他当时站在池底”

translation.en: I said, "No, no, no, no, no."
translation.zh: 我说：“不行”

translation.en: Yeah, exactly. You gotta be swimming. Exactly.
translation.zh: 没错 你得游泳 是的

translation.en: -That's right. -Now, does he…
translation.zh: -没错-现在 他…

translation.en: Here's the only question. Does he… Does he know?
translation.zh: 我只有一个问题 他…他知道吗？

translation.en: Is there a way to do it in a way where he doesn't know what happened?
translation.zh: 有办法在他不知情的情况下操作吗？

translation.en: Well, what I would say to him, if you wanna have that discussion now,
translation.zh: 如果你想现在聊这件事的话我会跟他说

translation.en: is say we have friends in athletics who are going to help him.
translation.zh: 我们有运动领域的朋友会帮助他

translation.en: Because he is an athlete.
translation.zh: 因为他是个运动员

translation.en: But I can't say that in front of my son 'cause he knows he's not.
translation.zh: 但我不能当着我儿子的面说这个因为他知道自己不是运动员

translation.en: What he would know is that I'm going to take his stuff
translation.zh: 他会知道的是 我会拿上他的材料

translation.en: and get him some help, okay?
translation.zh: 帮他寻求一些帮助 好吗？

translation.en: That he would have no issue with,
translation.zh: 这样他不会介意

translation.en: you lobbying for him, you helping use your network.
translation.zh: 你为他进行游说用你的交际网帮助他

translation.en: -No issue. -You don't have to tell him a thing.
translation.zh: -没问题-你什么都不必告诉他

translation.en: [Agustin Huneeus] Is Bill McGlashan doing any of this shit?
translation.zh: 比尔麦格拉申做了这些事吗？

translation.en: Is he just talking a clean game and helping his kid?
translation.zh: 他说要公平竞争却又在帮自己的孩子？

translation.en: -He makes me feel guilty. -[Singer] Um…
translation.zh: -他让我很有罪恶感-呃…

translation.en: Or you taking care of him because you have other interests with him?
translation.zh: 还是说你帮他是因为和他有其他利益关系？

translation.en: No. No, not at all. It has nothing to do with his--
translation.zh: 不 完全没有 这和他没关系…

translation.en: But he didn't know. His kid had no idea.
translation.zh: 但他不知道 他的孩子不知情

translation.en: He didn't have any idea you helped him on the ACT.
translation.zh: 他不知道你帮他考ACT考试

translation.en: -That's what he asked for. -Bill McGlashan?
translation.zh: -这是他要求的-比尔麦格拉申？

translation.en: Asked for his son not knowing.
translation.zh: 他要求他儿子不能知情

translation.en: -Okay. -All right.
translation.zh: -好吧-好

translation.en: -So he's not been as forthcoming. -With me?
translation.zh: -所以他没有分享这些信息-和我吗？

translation.en: With you and with his own kid.
translation.zh: 对你和他孩子都没有分享

translation.en: He wants it that way.
translation.zh: 他希望这样做

translation.en: [Singer] Your guy Agustin?
translation.zh: 阿古斯丁是你朋友？

translation.en: [McGlashan] Agustin Huneeus, yeah.
translation.zh: 阿古斯丁亨尼斯 对

translation.en: He's pushing hard, trying to find out your guys' approach with your son.
translation.zh: 他逼得很紧 想知道你儿子用的方法

translation.en: He came to me, and I said I did not…
translation.zh: 他来找过我 我说我没有…

translation.en: I was not willing to talk to him about it.
translation.zh: 我当时不想告诉他

translation.en: He's been pushing me, too.
translation.zh: 他也对我追问得很紧

translation.en: He obviously wants to get your help, you know, with his daughter,
translation.zh: 他显然想让你帮他女儿

translation.en: and I just said, "You need to make your own call what you wanna do,
translation.zh: 我就说：“你要自己决定好想怎么做

translation.en: and you just need to talk to Rick and work with Rick."
translation.zh: 然后你只需要去找里奇 和他合作”

translation.en: No, that's good. He's pushing hard. Like, "You gotta tell me what they're doing."
translation.zh: 很好 他逼得很紧 他说“你得告诉我他们是怎么做的”

translation.en: I said, "Listen, this is their situation, and Bill is very connected.
translation.zh: 我说：“听着 这是他们的情况比尔人缘很广”

translation.en: You need to discuss this with Bill, not discuss it with me."
translation.zh: “你应该去和比尔聊 而不是找我”

translation.en: Well, he tried that. He tried that.
translation.zh: 他试过了

translation.en: Just so you know, he sort of had a conversation with another family
translation.zh: 我告诉你 他和另一个家庭也聊过

translation.en: about the side door approach you have and was sort of suggesting,
translation.zh: 讨论你的旁门方法 还暗示

translation.en: "Do you think this is right?" And I just said,
translation.zh: “你觉得这样对吗？”我就说

translation.en: "Agustin, you shouldn't be talking about this.
translation.zh: “阿古斯丁 你不应该谈论这个”

translation.en: What Rick does is very specific to circumstances."
translation.zh: “里奇的做法因人而异”

translation.en: And it just bothered me he's out there talking about it.
translation.zh: 他在外面谈论这件事让我很担忧

translation.en: Agreed. Agreed. Yeah. And that's…
translation.zh: 同感 是的 这…

translation.en: And that's what worries me, too.
translation.zh: 我也对此表示担心

translation.en: I said, "Listen, you are in a very competitive environment."
translation.zh: 我说：“听好你所处的环境竞争非常激烈”

translation.en: "You have to keep what you do to yourself. It will blow up on you.
translation.zh: “你对自己的做法要保密不然后果会很严重”

translation.en: No matter who you think you know, it doesn't matter."
translation.zh: “不管你认识谁 都不重要”

translation.en: That's right, and he's not discreet at all.
translation.zh: 没错 他一点都不小心

translation.en: That's why I wasn't comfortable talking to him about it.
translation.zh: 所以我不愿意和他讨论这个

translation.en: -Good. -Right.
translation.zh: -很好-是的

translation.en: Rick Singer provided reassurance.
translation.zh: 里奇辛格能打消你的疑虑

translation.en: The reassurance that other people just like you
translation.zh: （《纽约客》专职作家奈奥米弗莱） 安慰你说 其他像你一样的人也是这么过来的

translation.en: are going through this thing.
translation.zh: 安慰你说 其他像你一样的人也是这么过来的

translation.en: "I've dealt with this a million times."
translation.zh: “这事我干过千百回了”

translation.en: Rick was like a therapist or a life coach,
translation.zh: 里奇就像是个治疗师或是人生教练

translation.en: only he was also a criminal.
translation.zh: 只不过他同时也是个罪犯

translation.en: [Justin Paperny] My profile of Rick Singer is he's a born salesman.
translation.zh: 我的资料显示里奇辛格是个天生的销售员

translation.en: He was smooth and subtle,
translation.zh: 他精明细致

translation.en: not overbearing, and knew that he had time.
translation.zh: 不专横 他知道自己有时间 （联邦监狱顾问）

translation.en: It's not like someone has to get into school today.
translation.zh: 别人不是急着今天就要入学

translation.en: It's not like the test is tomorrow. They have time.
translation.zh: 考试也不是明天就开始 他们有时间

translation.en: So he nurtured the process well, like a good salesman does.
translation.zh: 他对流程进行精心准备就像优秀的销售人员做的那样

translation.en: So what sport would be the best for them?
translation.zh: 对他们来说什么运动最好？

translation.en: Is… is crew the best? Is that even gonna really matter?
translation.zh: 赛艇…赛艇是最好的吗？这个真的重要吗？

translation.en: For me, it doesn't matter.
translation.zh: 对我来说不重要

translation.en: I'll make him a sailor or something because of where you live.
translation.zh: 根据你们住的地方我会安排他成为帆船选手之类的

translation.en: [reporter] Massachusetts businessman John Wilson.
translation.zh: 麻省商人约翰威尔森

translation.en: He runs a private equity firm.
translation.zh: 他经营一家私募股权公司

translation.en: He's accused of paying more than a million dollars
translation.zh: 他被指控花费超过一百万美元

translation.en: to try to get his kids into elite universities.
translation.zh: 试图让他的孩子们进入精英大学

translation.en: And same kinda deal? Any sport? You don't have to play the sport?
translation.zh: 相同的情况？任选一种运动？不必参与这项运动

translation.en: [Singer] That's correct.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: Now, um… what if they don't actually get in?
translation.zh: 那么 呃…如果他们没能录取呢？

translation.en: [chuckles] You don't have to worry about it. It's a done deal.
translation.zh: 你不用担心这个 这是必成的买卖

translation.en: Okay. That's great.
translation.zh: 好 那很好

translation.en: Okay. I'll send you the information about the bank and the wiring stuff
translation.zh: 我会把银行和转账信息发给你

translation.en: in the next day or so.
translation.zh: 就这一两天

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Oh, by the way, mark your calendar for next July
translation.zh: 哦对了 你在日历上标记一下7月

translation.en: if you want in on, uh, Paris.
translation.zh: 如果你想来巴黎的话

translation.en: -Got a big birthday July 19. -Okay.
translation.zh: -7月19日有一场大型生日会-好

translation.en: -I rented out Versailles. -[chuckles] Oh, my God!
translation.zh: -我把凡尔赛宫租下来了-我的天！

translation.en: You're crazy.
translation.zh: 你疯了

translation.en: I know. A black tie party there, so you'll have to come.
translation.zh: 我知道 是正装晚宴 你得来

translation.en: One of the amazing things about Rick Singer is that this guy,
translation.zh: 里奇辛格有一个很神奇的地方

translation.en: from a kind of obscure background and without a lot to show on paper,
translation.zh: 就是他在背景模糊没有太多书面证明的情况下

translation.en: insinuated himself into quite a high social circle,
translation.zh: 巧妙进入了很高端的社交圈

translation.en: and made an awful lot of money doing it.
translation.zh: 大赚了一笔

translation.en: My sense was that Rick Singer had a somewhat unhappy childhood.
translation.zh: 我感觉里奇辛格的童年不太幸福

translation.en: His parents divorced when he was young.
translation.zh: 他父母在他小时候离婚了

translation.en: He was bright. He had the gift of the gab unquestionably.
translation.zh: 他很聪明 毫无疑问天生就有好口才

translation.en: After childhood, he went to several colleges.
translation.zh: 长大后 他去过几家大学

translation.en: After that, he went into coaching.
translation.zh: 之后开始当教练

translation.en: But his problem was he was too volatile, particularly as a high school coach.
translation.zh: 但他的问题在于情绪太过不稳定作为高中教练更不该如此

translation.en: He tended to scream at the players if something went wrong.
translation.zh: 一旦出了问题 他喜欢对球员大吼

translation.en: Kind of like the Bobby Knight of high school coaching.
translation.zh: 就像高中版的鲍比奈特教练

translation.en: When Sacramento State had a bad year, they went 4 and 24 one year,
translation.zh: 萨克拉门托州立大学成绩不好的那年他们4胜24败

translation.en: the whole coaching staff was fired, and that included Singer.
translation.zh: 整个教练团队都被开除了 包括辛格

translation.en: That's when he looked around and he said,
translation.zh: 那时他考虑了一下说

translation.en: "Maybe basketball coaching isn't for me after all.
translation.zh: “也许篮球教练并不适合我”

translation.en: I've gotta switch careers."
translation.zh: “我该转行了”

translation.en: And he noticed this new industry of independent college advisors,
translation.zh: 他注意到独立大学顾问这个新产业

translation.en: and he became the first one in Sacramento.
translation.zh: 成为了萨克拉门托第一位顾问

translation.en: It's interesting how his background, in a way, prepared him for this scandal.
translation.zh: 有意思的是 他的背景一定程度为他的丑闻做了铺垫

translation.en: If you think about it, as a basketball coach in college,
translation.zh: 想象一下 作为一名大学篮球教练

translation.en: he had firsthand exposure to how athletic admissions worked,
translation.zh: 他有运动员录取流程的亲身经历

translation.en: and that was knowledge that undoubtedly he put to use years later
translation.zh: 这些知识无疑在几年后让他学以致用

translation.en: in his efforts to bribe coaches to portray kids falsely as recruited athletes.
translation.zh: 帮助他通过贿赂教练伪造孩子们应募运动员的身份

translation.en: He knew athletic admissions from the inside.
translation.zh: 他知道运动员录取的内部信息

translation.en: [Singer] Hey, John. How are ya?
translation.zh: -嘿 约翰 你好吗？-嘿 里奇 我很好

translation.en: Hey, Rick. I'm okay.
translation.zh: -嘿 约翰 你好吗？-嘿 里奇 我很好 （18年10月27日）

translation.en: I'm here in a big rainstorm in Saudi Arabia.
translation.zh: 我正在沙特阿拉伯经历大暴雨

translation.en: -[Singer] Saudi Arabia? -[Wilson] Yeah, I'm in Dubai.
translation.zh: -沙特阿拉伯？-是的 我在迪拜

translation.en: [Singer] I didn't know they had storms like that out there.
translation.zh: 我不知道那里会有这样的暴风雨

translation.en: [Wilson] Yeah, I know. Very unusual. What's happening?
translation.zh: 是啊 很反常 什么事？

translation.en: So I just gave the Stanford sailing coach $160,000 for his program.
translation.zh: 我刚给了斯坦福的帆船教练十六万美元用于他的项目

translation.en: While we were having that conversation, I said,
translation.zh: 我们谈话的时候 我说

translation.en: "Hey, I'm hoping that this 160 I'm helping you with
translation.zh: “嘿 我希望我帮你搞到的这十六万

translation.en: helps secure a spot for next year."
translation.zh: 能帮忙留住明年的一个位置”

translation.en: "Can I be guaranteed a spot for next year?" And he said yes.
translation.zh: “明年能保证给我留一个位置吗？”他说可以

translation.en: -All it takes? -No.
translation.zh: -这就够了？-不

translation.en: -No, that's not all it takes. -[scoffs] Yeah, okay.
translation.zh: -不 这不够-好吧

translation.en: This is not TJ Maxx or Marshalls or something like that.
translation.zh: 这不是麦克斯折扣店或是马歇尔商店之类的

translation.en: -Right. -So I want you to have first dibs.
translation.zh: -没错-所以我想让你先选

translation.en: If you want, I can provide John Vandemoer with a check.
translation.zh: 如果你愿意我可以给约翰万迪默一张支票

translation.en: I can send him your $500,000 to secure a spot for one of your girls.
translation.zh: 我可以把你的五十万给他为你的一个女儿保留一个位置

translation.en: John Vandemoer, he was kind of lured out to Stanford.
translation.zh: 约翰万迪默算是被挖到斯坦福的 （《纽约时报》记者 比利维兹）

translation.en: He was a successful sailing coach on the East Coast.
translation.zh: （《纽约时报》记者 比利维兹） 他曾是东海岸一名成功的帆船教练

translation.en: My name is John Vandemoer.
translation.zh: 我叫约翰万迪默

translation.en: I am the head coach of the Stanford University sailing team…
translation.zh: 我是斯坦福大学帆船队的总教练…

translation.en: By all accounts, he seemed like a good, upstanding guy.
translation.zh: 大家说 他看起来是个正直的好人

translation.en: There were a lot of people that were surprised, who knew him,
translation.zh: 他涉事的情况让很多认识他的人

translation.en: that he got caught up in this.
translation.zh: 感到震惊

translation.en: [man 1] SF1, take eight, soft sticks.
translation.zh: SF1 第八次 轻板

translation.en: [man 2] Audio good?
translation.zh: （前斯坦福帆船教练 约翰万迪默）

translation.en: [man 3] Almost clear. All clear. Thank you.
translation.zh: -收音可以吗？-快好了 一切就绪 谢谢

translation.en: [man 2] Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Did you ever imagine yourself in this situation
translation.zh: 在发生这些事之前

translation.en: before any of this happened?
translation.zh: 你有想过自己会到这个境地吗？

translation.en: Never. It's a lot. It's something I don't think I've fully comprehended yet.
translation.zh: 从来没有 信息量太大我觉得我还没有完全消化

translation.en: But it's something that'll impact the rest of my life.
translation.zh: 但这注定会对我的余生产生影响

translation.en: I first got connected with Rick Singer through a phone call.
translation.zh: 里奇辛格第一次是通过电话和我取得了联络

translation.en: He called me one day,
translation.zh: 有一天他打电话给我

translation.en: he introduced himself, said he was a college recruiter,
translation.zh: 介绍了自己 说他是个大学招生人员

translation.en: and was interested in doing more with smaller sports.
translation.zh: 有兴趣接触更多小众运动

translation.en: So I thought it was intriguing and agreed to meet with him the next morning.
translation.zh: 我觉得挺有趣的 就同意和他见面

translation.en: What I thought was interesting is that I was expecting him to text me or call me
translation.zh: 有意思的是 我本以为他到了斯坦福

translation.en: when he got to Stanford.
translation.zh: 会发消息或打电话给我

translation.en: Because Stanford has… It's very secure.
translation.zh: 因为斯坦福很重视安保

translation.en: You have to have a keycard to kind of swipe in and out of every door.
translation.zh: 每扇门都要刷卡才能进出

translation.en: And somehow he just showed up at my door.
translation.zh: 他不知怎的就出现在我门口

translation.en: I was shocked by that, but it definitely told me
translation.zh: 我很震惊 但这让我知道

translation.en: he had connections with Stanford that were deeper than myself.
translation.zh: 他在斯坦福的人脉远不止我一个

translation.en: Rick Singer is kind of your California beach bum, in a way.
translation.zh: 里奇辛格感觉有些地方很像那种在沙滩闲逛的加州人

translation.en: Flip-flops, T-shirt, shorts.
translation.zh: 人字拖、T恤衫、短裤

translation.en: He was actually really easy to talk to. I had really good conversations with him.
translation.zh: 和他聊天很轻松 我和他聊得很愉快

translation.en: He was really engaging and drawing me in.
translation.zh: 他的话题让我很感兴趣

translation.en: Our interaction was solely about recruiting.
translation.zh: 我们的互动完全围绕着招生

translation.en: The way recruiting works at Stanford is
translation.zh: 斯坦福的招生方式是

translation.en: each sport is given a certain amount of spots that you can support.
translation.zh: 每项运动会获得一定数量的名额

translation.en: He kinda ended with him talking about this young woman named Molly Zhao.
translation.zh: 最后他基本都在说这个叫赵雨思的女生

translation.en: Hello, everyone. I am, um, 17 now. I've just graduated from high school.
translation.zh: 大家好 我今年17岁我刚高中毕业

translation.en: [Vandemoer] Rick said that she really wanted to go to Stanford.
translation.zh: 里奇说她很想上斯坦福大学

translation.en: My recruiting was pretty much done at that point.
translation.zh: 那时候我的招生已经结束了

translation.en: So I wasn't considering her for a spot I could support, and I had told Rick that.
translation.zh: 我当时没想为她提供名额我也告诉了里奇

translation.en: He contacted me almost right away and was like,
translation.zh: 他马上联系我说

translation.en: "Is there any other way you could support?"
translation.zh: “有什么其他办法能请你支持一下吗？”

translation.en: "Her family is pretty wealthy."
translation.zh: “她家很有钱”

translation.en: "They'd be interested in donating about a million dollars."
translation.zh: “他们愿意捐赠约一百万美元”

translation.en: My athletic director said that it's something Stanford could do,
translation.zh: 我的体育主管说斯坦福有这种操作

translation.en: but that a million dollars wasn't enough to really have an impact with admissions.
translation.zh: 但一百万美元并不会对录取产生很大影响

translation.en: So that was it. And I didn't hear anything from Rick for a while.
translation.zh: 就是这样之后一段时间里奇都没联系我

translation.en: In August of that next year,
translation.zh: 第二年8月

translation.en: Rick called me up out of the blue and said, "Hey, this is fantastic."
translation.zh: 里奇突然打电话给我说“嘿 这太棒了”

translation.en: "Molly got in, the family's so excited. Thanks for all you did."
translation.zh: “雨思被录取了他们家很激动 谢谢你的帮忙”

translation.en: I said, "Great. I'm excited for her."
translation.zh: 我说：“太好了 我为她高兴”

translation.en: "It's a big deal to get into Stanford. But I didn't really do anything."
translation.zh: “被斯坦福录取是件大事但我什么都没做”

translation.en: He said, "Well, they're really excited and wanna donate $500,000 to your program."
translation.zh: 他说：“他们很激动想给你的项目捐款五十万美元”

translation.en: I said, "If they wanna donate $500,000 to the sailing program for me doing nothing,
translation.zh: 我说：“如果我什么都没做他们还是想给帆船项目捐五十万美元

translation.en: that sounds great to me."
translation.zh: 那我没有意见”

translation.en: I see no evidence that John did do anything to get Molly Zhao into Stanford.
translation.zh: 我没有看到证据显示约翰做了任何事帮助赵雨思进入斯坦福

translation.en: Why did Rick Singer donate $500,000 in the name of Molly Zhao?
translation.zh: 里奇辛格为何要以赵雨思名义捐赠五十万美元？

translation.en: Only Rick knows the answer to that.
translation.zh: 只有里奇知道答案

translation.en: It may have been a huge down payment
translation.zh: 这可能是进入斯坦福帆船项目的

translation.en: for access to the Stanford sailing program.
translation.zh: 巨额预付款

translation.en: [Vandemoer] He sent the check. I got it in the mail at my campus mailbox,
translation.zh: 他寄来了支票我在我的校园邮箱信件中收到了它

translation.en: and I went in to Development and told my athletic director
translation.zh: 我去发展部告诉我的体育主管

translation.en: I'd gotten this $500,000 donation.
translation.zh: 我收到了这笔五十万美元的捐款

translation.en: She was excited for me. We talked about how
translation.zh: 她很兴奋 我们谈论了

translation.en: I hadn't done anything for it, it was out of the blue.
translation.zh: 我此前并未做任何事捐款来得毫无缘由

translation.en: But, you know, I guess that's the best kind of donation.
translation.zh: 我想这种捐款是最好的

translation.en: At the same time, the head athletic director for Stanford was there, as well,
translation.zh: 同时 斯坦福首席体育主管也在场

translation.en: and said congratulations, was excited about it.
translation.zh: 说祝贺你们 他也很兴奋

translation.en: I started to explain, "Hey, it's through this guy, Rick Singer."
translation.zh: 我开始解释“捐款是通过里奇辛格收到的”

translation.en: He turned to me, interrupted me and said, "Oh, I know Rick."
translation.zh: 他转向我并打断了我说“我认识里奇”

translation.en: [Billy Witz] I think what we see here is school administration officials
translation.zh: 我觉得我们此时看到的是学校管理官员们

translation.en: want to keep the money coming in.
translation.zh: 希望有资金能进来

translation.en: They don't wanna ask questions of how it got there.
translation.zh: 他们不想去质疑资金注入的原因

translation.en: And I think we definitely saw this in the case of Stanford.
translation.zh: 我觉得我们在斯坦福的案例中确实看出了这一点

translation.en: When you'd have $100, $200, $500,000 donations
translation.zh: 当你收到十万、二十万、五十万美元的捐款

translation.en: that would come in for something like sailing,
translation.zh: 捐给帆船这样的项目

translation.en: that that wouldn't raise any red flags or wouldn't be scrutinized.
translation.zh: 不会引发任何问题 也不会被审查

translation.en: It seems as if Singer targeted sports that were under the radar
translation.zh: 看来辛格好像着眼于不受关注的运动

translation.en: because the margins are tighter.
translation.zh: 因为利润更吃紧

translation.en: He knew the right places to look.
translation.zh: 他知道该去哪找机会

translation.en: So I've got two kids at Stanford and two kids at Yale.
translation.zh: 我有两个孩子要申请斯坦福两个申请耶鲁

translation.en: I'm trying to find out who's stepping up first.
translation.zh: 我想看看谁能先得到机会

translation.en: [Rudy Meredith] Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Don't matter. 'Cause I might have a spot for both of 'em.
translation.zh: 不要紧 因为我也许能给他们两个都弄到名额

translation.en: -Really? -Maybe.
translation.zh: -真的吗？-也许

translation.en: [reporter] Yale soccer coach Rudy Meredith pocketing more than $860,000 in bribes.
translation.zh: 耶鲁足球教练卢迪梅里迪斯收受逾八十六万美元贿赂

translation.en: [Meredith] You can come in an Ivy League environment and develop as a player
translation.zh: 你可以进入常春藤联盟的环境发展成为一名球员

translation.en: and still have your Yale degree.
translation.zh: 同时还能获得耶鲁学位

translation.en: Give me… Give me the names. I'm working on it.
translation.zh: 给我…把名单给我 我在处理

translation.en: I got a new athletic director is what I'm trying to tell you.
translation.zh: 我想告诉你的是我们来了一名新的体育主管

translation.en: I'm trying to work it.
translation.zh: 我在努力

translation.en: Hold on one sec. Let me just, uh…
translation.zh: 稍等 让我稍微…

translation.en: You know, I have no idea where the hell I am here in London.
translation.zh: 我不知道自己现在位于伦敦的什么位置

translation.en: Mm-hmm. No problem.
translation.zh: 嗯 没问题

translation.en: Frickin' hate these one-way street bullshit things.
translation.zh: 我太讨厌这种单行道了

translation.en: I know. And you're on the left side of the road. Be careful.
translation.zh: 我知道 而且你要靠左行驶 小心点

translation.en: Yeah, tell me about it. Now I'm, uh, at two-three.
translation.zh: 可不是吗 我现在在二三

translation.en: Where's four-five?
translation.zh: 四五在哪？

translation.en: Where the fuck is it?
translation.zh: 到底在哪？

translation.en: Now I'm on the main street again.
translation.zh: 我又回到主路上了

translation.en: I tell you what, I'm glad I live in the US.
translation.zh: 跟你说 我真庆幸自己住在美国

translation.en: [Meredith laughs] It wouldn't be bad if you were in Sweden.
translation.zh: 住在瑞典也还不错

translation.en: [Singer] Then I gotta find myself a good Swedish girl, then.
translation.zh: 那我得给自己找个漂亮的瑞典姑娘

translation.en: [Meredith] All right. Next time I'm in Sweden, I'll take a look.
translation.zh: 好吧 下次我去瑞典留意看看

translation.en: Tell me what you're looking for, I'll see what I can do.
translation.zh: 告诉我你想找什么样的 我来想办法

translation.en: Yeah. Well, I'll tell you this much.
translation.zh: 好 我这么给你说吧

translation.en: At my age, it's hard to find the right people.
translation.zh: 我这个年纪很难找到合适的人

translation.en: That's the hardest thing.
translation.zh: 这是最难的

translation.en: [Patricia Logan] I met Rick through my very first time on a dating site.
translation.zh: 我是在第一次用约会网站时认识的里奇

translation.en: I'd never been on a dating site before in my life.
translation.zh: 此前我从未用过约会网站 （生意伙伴 友人 帕特里沙罗根）

translation.en: And, at 53 years old at the time, I figured,
translation.zh: 那时53岁的我想

translation.en: "All right. It's… Let me give it a try."
translation.zh: “好吧 我就试试看”

translation.en: There he was, and there I was, and he messaged me, and…
translation.zh: 他登陆了网站 我也登陆了网站他给我发消息 然后…

translation.en: [clicks tongue] it went from there.
translation.zh: 就这样开始了

translation.en: When I met him, did I look him up online? Of course. Right away.
translation.zh: 我认识他时 我在网上搜索他了吗？当然 马上就搜了

translation.en: And I thought, "Wow, this guy is…"
translation.zh: 我心想：“哇 这个人…”

translation.en: Other than the poor video quality on his website,
translation.zh: 他的网站除了视频质量很差外

translation.en: I thought, "This is very interesting, what he does."
translation.zh: 我觉得“这个人做的事很有意思”

translation.en: My key method unlocks the full potential of your son or daughter
translation.zh: 我的核心方法可以帮你的子女充分解锁天赋

translation.en: and sets them on a course to excel in life.
translation.zh: 让他们走上人生巅峰

translation.en: I thought, "He's really a go-getter."
translation.zh: 我心想：“他是个志在必得的人”

translation.en: "He's really out there doing something good."
translation.zh: “他真的在做很棒的事情”

translation.en: I met him out for dinner. It was interesting,
translation.zh: 我和他见面共进晚餐 很有意思

translation.en: when we first started comparing notes about our pasts,
translation.zh: 当我们开始比较彼此过去的人生经历时

translation.en: and we both started working the very same time.
translation.zh: 发现我们是同时开始职业生涯的

translation.en: He was 12 and I was 12. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 他12岁起步 我也是12岁起步

translation.en: I had a paper route,
translation.zh: 我为一条街送报纸

translation.en: and he was the kid that got the older kids to buy alcohol,
translation.zh: 他是让大孩子买酒再卖给他

translation.en: sell to him, he'd sell it then for a profit to kids.
translation.zh: 然后他再卖给其他孩子赚钱

translation.en: So I said, "Okay, I had a paper route,
translation.zh: 于是我说：“我送报纸

translation.en: you're a minor selling booze to minors. Great."
translation.zh: 你是卖酒给未成年人的未成年人 很好”

translation.en: He goes, "Yeah, I was very industrious." [chuckles]
translation.zh: 他说：“是 我那时很勤奋”

translation.en: So we laughed about that. And he was charismatic.
translation.zh: 我们都笑了 他很有魅力

translation.en: He was… interesting. He was smart.
translation.zh: 他…很有趣 很聪明

translation.en: It was quick. It was like, "Nice to meet you. Great. Good night.
translation.zh: 那次经历就是“幸会 很好 晚安”

translation.en: I really like you. When I find time, let's go out again." [laughs]
translation.zh: “我很喜欢你有时间再一起出来玩” （我对你也是这种感觉）

translation.en: -[man] Was he pretty serious? -Oh, super serious.
translation.zh: -他是认真的吗？-非常认真

translation.en: One time I sent him an emoji, the Bitmoji, I said, "Hi."
translation.zh: 有一次我发表情符号给他我说：“你好” （加油 疯丫头）

translation.en: And he came back with, "You're crazy. Stay cool in school." Little goofy.
translation.zh: 他回复道：“你疯了在学校冷静点” 有点呆

translation.en: His own family said, you know, I made him laugh.
translation.zh: 他的家人说我能让他开怀大笑

translation.en: [laughs] He needed to laugh more.
translation.zh: 他需要多笑笑

translation.en: He was not, uh…
translation.zh: 他没有…

translation.en: wanting to stick around long.
translation.zh: 想要待很久

translation.en: He was just so very busy with college coaching, house to house.
translation.zh: 他太忙于大学教练的事情了挨家挨户拜访

translation.en: [Golden] Another characteristic of Singer's was that, you know, he worked nonstop.
translation.zh: 辛格还有一个性格特点就是工作狂

translation.en: From what his former assistants told me, he wouldn't spend the night at a hotel.
translation.zh: 他的前任助手告诉我他不会在酒店过夜

translation.en: He'd spend it on an airplane.
translation.zh: 他会通宵坐飞机

translation.en: And he would be, you know, texting his assistants at all hours of the day,
translation.zh: 他会全天候给助手们发消息

translation.en: giving them various tasks.
translation.zh: 给他们安排各种任务

translation.en: He was an extremely driven guy.
translation.zh: 他是个很有驱动力的人

translation.en: [Logan] I got the sense he had clients all over the place.
translation.zh: 我感觉他的客户遍布各地

translation.en: I look back on text messages, and every time we connect, he says,
translation.zh: 我回头看聊天记录每次联络时他都说

translation.en: "I'm in Dallas. I'm in Fort Lauderdale. I'm in New York. Back to California."
translation.zh: “我在达拉斯 我在劳德代尔堡我在纽约 回加州了”

translation.en: He even lived out of a van at times when he was coaching.
translation.zh: 他做教练时甚至有时会住在车里

translation.en: He had this big Mercedes-type van thing.
translation.zh: 他有一辆奔驰大货车

translation.en: He'd sleep in it 'cause it was just easier.
translation.zh: 他会睡在车里 方便一些

translation.en: [Logan] Rick had a passion for just getting up every morning, 4:00 a.m.,
translation.zh: 里奇有早起的热情 凌晨4点起床

translation.en: working out, swimming, cycling, running.
translation.zh: 锻炼、游泳、骑车、跑步

translation.en: That man was like the Energizer Bunny.
translation.zh: 他就像劲量电池兔子一样不知疲倦

translation.en: I've never seen anybody that would just have so much energy
translation.zh: 我没见过像他这样永远充满能量

translation.en: and go, go, go.
translation.zh: 向前冲的人

translation.en: I think he lived on about three hours of sleep a night, from my understanding.
translation.zh: 我感觉他每天晚上只睡三小时

translation.en: And that was fine with him.
translation.zh: 他完全没问题

translation.en: I looked at a lot of his behaviors and realized,
translation.zh: 我看过他的种种行为之后意识到

translation.en: you know, he was hiding a lot.
translation.zh: 他在隐藏很多东西

translation.en: He had been leading and living this secret life.
translation.zh: 他过着谜一样的生活

translation.en: No wonder why he couldn't get close to people.
translation.zh: 难怪他和别人不亲近

translation.en: -[Huneeus] Hey, Rick? -[Singer] Hey there.
translation.zh: -嘿 里奇？-嘿

translation.en: -Is this a good time? -Yeah. It's good for me.
translation.zh: -方便说话吗？-可以 没问题

translation.en: Okay, great.
translation.zh: 很好

translation.en: My name is Agustin Huneeus.
translation.zh: 我叫阿古斯丁亨尼斯

translation.en: We're sitting in one of the pavilions,
translation.zh: 我们正坐在一个亭子里

translation.en: enjoying a beautiful afternoon at Quintessa in Napa.
translation.zh: 享受纳帕昆塔莎酒庄的美好午后

translation.en: And so let's go and taste.
translation.zh: 让我们尝尝吧

translation.en: Just walk me through the whole kind of water polo thing again and how it works.
translation.zh: 再跟我解释一下水球的事情以及运作原理

translation.en: You and I talked about the economics, timing and how all that works.
translation.zh: 我们聊过经济问题、时机及其原理

translation.en: You and I had a brief conversation about it, but I want to get it straight.
translation.zh: 我们简短地聊过 但我想说清楚

translation.en: Okay. Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: I'm putting together your daughter's sports profile now.
translation.zh: 我在准备你女儿的运动资料

translation.en: It'll be a water polo profile now.
translation.zh: 会做成水球运动员的资料

translation.en: I take her transcript, test scores and profile
translation.zh: 我拿她的成绩单、考试分数和资料

translation.en: to the liaison for all sports at USC.
translation.zh: 去找了南加大所有运动种类的联络人

translation.en: Football… Everybody has to go through her.
translation.zh: 橄榄球 所有人都要找她

translation.en: [Heinel] My name's Donna Heinel, and I am a senior associate athletic director.
translation.zh: 我叫多纳海涅尔是一名资深助理体育主管

translation.en: I have the…
translation.zh: 我有…

translation.en: [Witz] By all accounts, Donna Heinel was a very diligent supervisor
translation.zh: 据说多纳海涅尔是个很勤勉的主管

translation.en: who was really a stickler for details.
translation.zh: 非常注重细节

translation.en: She was also getting 20 grand a month from Singer.
translation.zh: 她每月从辛格处获取两万美元

translation.en: And then she… They have meetings every other Thursday,
translation.zh: 然后她…他们每隔一周的周四开一次会

translation.en: which are called subcommittee meetings,
translation.zh: 也就是小组委员会会议

translation.en: where the dean of admissions and two admissions staff go through the athletes.
translation.zh: 招生办主任和两名招生工作人员一起审阅运动员

translation.en: It could be water polo this week, football next week.
translation.zh: 这周可能是水球 下周是橄榄球

translation.en: It could be basketball.
translation.zh: 也许是篮球

translation.en: It depends on where they are in the seasons and what's going on.
translation.zh: 取决于赛季进度和目前情况

translation.en: Heinel became the gatekeeper
translation.zh: 海涅尔成为了

translation.en: between the admissions department and the athletic department.
translation.zh: 招生部门和体育部门之间的把关人

translation.en: Because the idea was for the students to be treated as recruited athletes,
translation.zh: 因为这样做的目的是让学生成为被招募的运动员

translation.en: that's virtually a guarantee of admission.
translation.zh: 这其实就是录取的保障

translation.en: Some of the fake athletes at USC, it seems like it would be hard to miss.
translation.zh: 南加大某些假运动员看上去很难不被人发现

translation.en: I mean, there was a 5'5" men's basketball player.
translation.zh: 比如有一个1米65的男性篮球球员

translation.en: A high school cheerleader was made to look like a lacrosse player.
translation.zh: 一名高中啦啦队员被包装成棍网球运动员

translation.en: There was a water polo player who didn't play water polo in high school.
translation.zh: 一个在高中没打过水球的水球球员

translation.en: It's pretty remarkable that none of these things raised a red flag.
translation.zh: 这些案例都未曾引起注意太不可思议了

translation.en: And on the rare occasion when they did,
translation.zh: 偶然被注意到时

translation.en: Heinel was there to smooth them over with the admissions department.
translation.zh: 海涅尔会跟招生部门把事情摆平

translation.en: [Singer] Your daughter will get presented, and if the committee says,"She's in,"
translation.zh: 会上将会展示你女儿的资料如果委员会说：“她被录取了”

translation.en: then what happens is Donna tells me she's in, we're good.
translation.zh: 然后多纳会告诉我她录取了这样就可以了

translation.en: Essentially, she's been admitted before she even applied.
translation.zh: 基本上 她还没申请就被录取了

translation.en: At that point, you will send your $200,000 check to our foundation.
translation.zh: 那时 你就把二十万美元支票寄到我们基金会

translation.en: Then Jovan will call me and say, "Okay, this is how I want the money split."
translation.zh: 然后乔万会打电话跟我说“我要这样分钱” （“乔万”是谁？）

translation.en: You understand my daughter's not worthy to be on that team.
translation.zh: 你知道我女儿的能力进不了那个队

translation.en: No, no, he's my guy,
translation.zh: 不 他是我的人

translation.en: and he knows she's not coming to play. He knows all that.
translation.zh: 他知道她不会去打球 他都知道

translation.en: There were four USC employees that were involved with Rick Singer.
translation.zh: （乔万瓦维克 全国年度最佳教练） 有四名南加大员工和里奇辛格有关

translation.en: One of them was Jovan Vavic, the water polo coach.
translation.zh: 其中之一是乔万瓦维克 水球教练

translation.en: Vavic is by far the most successful coach in college water polo.
translation.zh: 瓦维克是目前大学水球队最成功的教练

translation.en: Vavic has been charged by authorities of accepting more than $250,000
translation.zh: 瓦维克被官方指控收受逾二十五万美元

translation.en: in exchange for helping two students get into USC as water polo players.
translation.zh: 帮助两名学生以水球运动员身份被南加大录取

translation.en: [Singer] Donna Heinel essentially puts them on the recruited walk-on list,
translation.zh: 多纳海涅尔把他们放在临时队员招生名单上

translation.en: which happens all the time.
translation.zh: 这很常见

translation.en: And they just don't show up for practice, and that's fine.
translation.zh: 他们不出席训练也没关系

translation.en: One of the things Singer took advantage of
translation.zh: 辛格加以利用的一点是

translation.en: was the fact that athletic departments and admissions offices
translation.zh: 体育部门和招生办公室

translation.en: both take a coach's word
translation.zh: 都信任教练

translation.en: for the athletic caliber of the person they're recruiting.
translation.zh: 对于他们招募学生的运动才能的评论

translation.en: Is there any risk that this thing blows up in my face?
translation.zh: 这事有败露的风险吗？

translation.en: [Singer] It hasn't in 24 years.
translation.zh: 24年来都没有发生过

translation.en: No, I know all that, but the environment…
translation.zh: 不 这我知道 但我是指环境

translation.en: Like, some article comes out
translation.zh: 比如有文章出来

translation.en: that the polo team is selling seats into the school for 250 grand.
translation.zh: 说水球队以二十五万的价格出售队内名额

translation.en: Well, no, because she's a water polo player.
translation.zh: 不会 因为她是个水球球员

translation.en: But she's not.
translation.zh: 但她不是

translation.en: [Chloe] I'm so scared.
translation.zh: 我太害怕了

translation.en: [woman] Check it. No matter what happens, you're gonna be fine.
translation.zh: 查吧 无论如何 你都会没事的

translation.en: -[man] You have to face it. -[woman] You have to face it. Yeah.
translation.zh: -你得面对-你得面对 是啊

translation.en: -You're gonna be fine. I promise. -I got deferred.
translation.zh: -你会没事的 我保证-我被拒了

translation.en: [woman] You got deferred?
translation.zh: 你被拒了？

translation.en: There's an update in your application portal,
translation.zh: 你的申请网站会有更新

translation.en: you click on it, and then that letter pops up.
translation.zh: 点击之后 信件弹出

translation.en: "We appreciate your passion for our school. We're sorry to inform you…"
translation.zh: “感谢你对我校的喜爱我们很遗憾地通知你…”

translation.en: "…we are unable to offer you admission to Stanford."
translation.zh: “…我们无法录取你就读斯坦福大学”

translation.en: I'm not getting into San Diego or UCLA.
translation.zh: 我不能去加州大学圣地亚哥分校或洛杉矶分校了

translation.en: Just makes me feel like shit.
translation.zh: 我感觉很糟糕

translation.en: I literally started bawling. Like, it just angered me.
translation.zh: 我真的是放声痛哭 我好生气

translation.en: There were a lot of tears, punching the wall, cursing.
translation.zh: 流了很多眼泪 不断捶墙、咒骂

translation.en: I didn't leave my room. I was crying the entire weekend.
translation.zh: 我没出房间 整个周末我都在哭

translation.en: I got rejected.
translation.zh: 我被拒了

translation.en: [Priscilla Sands] I have seen a change, and I have seen a progression.
translation.zh: 我看到了改变和发展

translation.en: And I do think that students are more obsessed with college.
translation.zh: 我认为学生们对大学越来越痴迷 （马尔堡 校长 普利西拉桑兹）

translation.en: I'd say most kids are getting plagued by this anxiety, and you can feel it.
translation.zh: 多数孩子被这种焦虑折磨我们能感觉到

translation.en: They're freaking out when you meet with them.
translation.zh: 和他们见面时 他们吓坏了

translation.en: They're like, "What if this happens?" "What about that?"
translation.zh: 他们问“如果这样会怎样？那样呢？”

translation.en: "Will they not like me because I wrote this one word?"
translation.zh: “他们会因为我写了这个词而不喜欢我吗？”

translation.en: It's like they're losing their minds because of it.
translation.zh: 他们为此已经失去理智了

translation.en: Basically, I got rejected by almost all of the colleges I applied to.
translation.zh: 我申请的所有学校几乎都发来了拒信

translation.en: It's awful because you think something's wrong with yourself.
translation.zh: 太糟了 因为这让我开始觉得自己有问题

translation.en: When we have children and they apply to colleges, where will they go?
translation.zh: 等我们有了孩子 他们申请大学时他们要去哪？

translation.en: No one's getting into colleges at that point.
translation.zh: 那时候谁也上不了大学

translation.en: It's crazy. Like, USC's acceptance rate just went down three more percent.
translation.zh: 太疯狂了 南加大的录取率又降了三个百分点

translation.en: It's at 12% now, which is like…
translation.zh: 现在是12%了 这简直…

translation.en: Most students who wanna go to college could find a college.
translation.zh: 大部分想上大学的学生都有大学上

translation.en: The problem is
translation.zh: 问题是

translation.en: far too many students want to go to the same colleges.
translation.zh: 太多学生想去同一批大学

translation.en: My goals were Ivy League. I wanted to get in that.
translation.zh: 我的目标是常春藤联盟我想进那些学校

translation.en: And when I didn't get in, I was… just broken.
translation.zh: 当我被拒时 我…我崩溃了

translation.en: I took AP bio. I'm taking AP environmental science this year. I…
translation.zh: 我学了生物先修课今年要学环境科学先修课 我…

translation.en: I'm not interested in it at all.
translation.zh: 我完全不感兴趣

translation.en: Just to have this extra leverage that doesn't even help.
translation.zh: 就是想有点小优势 结果根本没用

translation.en: [Barbara Kalmus] This is going on in high schools across the country.
translation.zh: 全国的高中都是如此

translation.en: How many advanced classes can you take?
translation.zh: 你能选多少先修课？

translation.en: You drop orchestra because if you don't do orchestra, you can take another science class.
translation.zh: 你放弃管弦乐队就为了再选一门科学课

translation.en: There's so much pressure on these kids.
translation.zh: 这些孩子们压力太大了

translation.en: Because if a school offers 15 APs and you've only taken one,
translation.zh: 因为如果学校提供了15门先修课而你只选了一门

translation.en: you can cross off the top 50 schools in the country.
translation.zh: 全国排名前50的学校你就别想了

translation.en: You have people who just go home and all they do is homework.
translation.zh: 有些人一回家就只是做作业

translation.en: I hate seeing how it consumes people's lives.
translation.zh: 我讨厌这种消耗人生的方式

translation.en: I think social media is a contributing factor,
translation.zh: 我觉得社交媒体起到了推波助澜的作用

translation.en: because as soon as a student anywhere has an acceptance, it goes onto social media,
translation.zh: 因为任何地方的学生一旦被录取都会在社交媒体上发帖

translation.en: so it's just another time to sort of feel a punch in the gut.
translation.zh: 这会造成又一次重创

translation.en: It's just really shitty to feel like this.
translation.zh: 这种感觉太糟了

translation.en: And I know that people that got in are super deserving.
translation.zh: 我知道被录取的人都优秀到值得被录取

translation.en: I like to curl my fake lash with my real lashes.
translation.zh: 我喜欢把假睫毛和真睫毛一起卷

translation.en: [Fry] Olivia Jade is an extremely successful YouTube influencer.
translation.zh: 奥利维亚杰德是个非常成功的YouTube视频博主

translation.en: She had millions of followers watch these videos where she would,
translation.zh: 她有百万粉丝关注她的视频

translation.en: you know, get up, brush her teeth, do her morning makeup routine,
translation.zh: 视频里是她早上起床、刷牙、化妆的流程

translation.en: pick out outfits. So it's this very diary-like thing,
translation.zh: 挑选穿搭 就像日记一样

translation.en: but with the added benefit of branding opportunities.
translation.zh: 但她有机会借此宣传品牌

translation.en: I created my own collection with Princess Polly.
translation.zh: 我创造了属于自己的波莉公主系列

translation.en: I get to reveal and announce
translation.zh: 我发布了

translation.en: my highlight palette with Sephora Collection.
translation.zh: 我的丝芙兰系列高光盘

translation.en: [Fry] She's the child of the actress Lori Loughlin
translation.zh: 她是演员罗瑞洛夫林

translation.en: and the fashion designer Mossimo Giannulli.
translation.zh: 和时尚设计师摩西莫杰努里的孩子

translation.en: They supposedly had both of their daughters, Olivia Jade and Bella,
translation.zh: 他们让两个女儿奥利维亚杰德和贝拉

translation.en: pose on a rowing machine, and sent these pictures to Rick Singer
translation.zh: 在划船机上摆拍把照片发给里奇辛格

translation.en: and had them accepted into USC as coxswains.
translation.zh: 让她们作为赛艇艇长被南加大录取

translation.en: I went to high school with Olivia Jade. I know the school she was at.
translation.zh: 我和奥利维亚杰德上的是同一所高中我知道她上的是哪所学校

translation.en: I saw a picture of Olivia Jade's sister on the wall with the seniors,
translation.zh: 我看到高三年级墙上有奥利维亚杰德姐姐的照片

translation.en: and it was like, "Congratulations for getting into USC."
translation.zh: 上面写着：“恭喜入学南加大”

translation.en: And then I remember hearing later that Olivia had also gotten into USC.
translation.zh: 然后我记得后来听说奥利维亚也进了南加大

translation.en: I was like, "Whoa." 'Cause USC is extremely hard to get into.
translation.zh: 我心想：“哇”因为南加大非常难进

translation.en: So not only one sister, but both of them.
translation.zh: 两姐妹居然都被录取了

translation.en: Off to school. [Loughlin] Bye, Olivia. Have a lovely day.
translation.zh: -去上学了-再见 奥利维亚 祝你今天开心

translation.en: -I know you're so excited. -I won't. I will not.
translation.zh: -我知道你很激动-我不会的

translation.en: Whatever.
translation.zh: 随便吧

translation.en: [Naomi Fry] There's an Olivia Jade video
translation.zh: 奥利维亚杰德有个视频

translation.en: where it's the first day of her senior year of high school,
translation.zh: 是她高三第一天

translation.en: and she's pretty miserable.
translation.zh: 她非常难受

translation.en: I've gone to one class, and I wanna die.
translation.zh: 我去了一节课 我想死

translation.en: It's so hot in every single room.
translation.zh: 每间教室都这么热

translation.en: I just wanna go home.
translation.zh: 我只想回家

translation.en: Then she returns home and she says, "I've never been so happy."
translation.zh: 然后她回家了 说“我从没有这么开心过”

translation.en: I've never been so happy to be anywhere in my whole entire life.
translation.zh: 我这辈子从没这么开心过我很喜欢那里

translation.en: Then there's also a nod to a kind of, like, you know, #blessed.
translation.zh: 然后还有感恩言论带“幸运”话题标签的那种

translation.en: Remember how lucky we are to have an education
translation.zh: 记住 我们能接受教育是多么幸运

translation.en: and how many people would kill to have a good education.
translation.zh: 有多少人拼命想获得良好的教育

translation.en: Or an education at all. So, as much as I hate it…
translation.zh: 或者只要能受教育就行 所以就算我很讨厌…

translation.en: I still hate it, but I'm grateful that I get to be educated.
translation.zh: 我还是讨厌读书但我很感恩有机会上学

translation.en: Even though I hate it.
translation.zh: 尽管我很讨厌读书

translation.en: Olivia Jade had said that she wanted to drop out of high school,
translation.zh: 奥利维亚杰德说过她想放弃读高中

translation.en: in fact, when she was a senior.
translation.zh: 就在她读高三的时候

translation.en: I told my mom I wanted to quit school. She was like, "That's not happening."
translation.zh: 我告诉我妈我想辍学她说：“绝不可能”

translation.en: She made me stick it out, and then my dad made me go to college.
translation.zh: 她让我坚持然后我爸把我送去读大学

translation.en: Mostly my parents really wanted me to go, because both of them didn't go to college…
translation.zh: 我父母想让我去因为他们都没读过大学…

translation.en: -They did all right. -[Olivia] They did fine.
translation.zh: -他们过得挺好的-是挺好的

translation.en: -They did fine. -[Olivia] Yeah.
translation.zh: -挺好的-是啊

translation.en: -[man] They are-- -Hypocrites.
translation.zh: -他们是…-伪君子

translation.en: [Fry] It never seemed like she was very interested
translation.zh: 她从未对大学能为她带来什么

translation.en: in what college could give her.
translation.zh: 表现出强烈兴趣

translation.en: Why should she be? She was very successful in what she was doing.
translation.zh: 她怎么会有兴趣呢？当时她所做的事已经很成功

translation.en: Things were going great for her.
translation.zh: 她顺风顺水

translation.en: [Fry] In November of 2017,
translation.zh: 好了 吉姆… 2017年11月

translation.en: Donna Heinel presented Olivia Jade's athletic profile to the USC subcommittee,
translation.zh: 多纳海涅尔将奥利维亚杰德的运动员资料送上南加大小组委员会

translation.en: and they approved her admission to the university conditionally.
translation.zh: 他们同意有条件录取她

translation.en: Less than two weeks later,
translation.zh: 过了不到两周

translation.en: Rick Singer wrote an email confirming to Olivia's parents
translation.zh: 里奇辛格写邮件向奥利维亚父母确认

translation.en: that she was going to be accepted at USC
translation.zh: 她会被南加大录取

translation.en: and told them to keep it hush-hush until March.
translation.zh: 让他们在3月之前不要把消息外传

translation.en: The guidance counselor at Olivia Jade's high school became suspicious
translation.zh: 奥利维亚杰德所在高中的辅导顾问产生了怀疑

translation.en: because he didn't believe either of the sisters participated in crew.
translation.zh: 因为他不相信两姐妹参与过赛艇运动

translation.en: According to the government, Olivia Jade and her parents
translation.zh: 据政府称 奥利维亚杰德和父母

translation.en: discussed how to avoid the possibility
translation.zh: 讨论过如何避免

translation.en: of the high school counselor disrupting their admissions scheme.
translation.zh: 高中顾问老师干扰他们的录取计划

translation.en: Olivia Jade asked whether she should list USC as her top choice school
translation.zh: 奥利维亚杰德问她是否该把南加大列为她的首选学校

translation.en: and Lori replied, "Yes, but it might be a flag for the weasel to meddle."
translation.zh: 罗瑞回答说：“是的 但这可能会引来那个黄鼠狼多管闲事”

translation.en: Presumably referring to the counselor.
translation.zh: 指的应该是那位顾问

translation.en: And Mossimo added to that, "Fuck him," and said that he was a "nosy bastard."
translation.zh: 摩西莫补充道：“去他的”然后说他是个“爱管闲事的混蛋”

translation.en: Things began to unravel when Olivia Jade's counselor
translation.zh: 奥利维亚杰德的顾问老师和一名南加大招生官员通话后

translation.en: had a phone call with a USC admissions official.
translation.zh: 事情开始被揭露出来

translation.en: [man] Conducted routine counselor call with USC
translation.zh: （奥利维亚杰德学校指导顾问的内部报告） 作为顾问 我照常和南加大通话检查今年几十位申请人的情况

translation.en: to check up on the dozens of applicants that year.
translation.zh: 作为顾问 我照常和南加大通话检查今年几十位申请人的情况

translation.en: When we got to Olivia,
translation.zh: 说到奥利维亚时

translation.en: USC said she was flagged as a recruit for the crew team.
translation.zh: 南加大说她是作为赛艇队成员被招募的

translation.en: I told them I had no knowledge of Olivia's involvement in crew.
translation.zh: 我告诉他们我并不知道奥利维亚参与过赛艇

translation.en: Based on what I knew of her video blogging schedule,
translation.zh: 根据我对她发布视频博客日程的了解

translation.en: I highly doubted she was involved in the sport.
translation.zh: 我怀疑她是否参与过这项运动

translation.en: [Fry] Somehow Mossimo found out what the counselor had said to USC,
translation.zh: 不知怎地 摩西莫知道了顾问对南加大说过的话

translation.en: and went to the school to confront him.
translation.zh: 于是去学校找他对质

translation.en: [man] I received a call from the front desk
translation.zh: 我接到前台的电话

translation.en: that Mr. Giannulli was downstairs and wanted to talk to me.
translation.zh: 说杰努里先生在楼下 想和我谈话

translation.en: When we sat down in my office,
translation.zh: 我们在我办公室坐下后

translation.en: he aggressively asked what I was telling USC about his daughters
translation.zh: 他气势汹汹地问我对南加大说了些什么关于他女儿的事

translation.en: and why I was trying to ruin or get in the way of their opportunities.
translation.zh: 以及我为什么要试图毁掉或是阻挠她们的机会

translation.en: His tone made me visibly nervous.
translation.zh: 他的语气让我十分紧张

translation.en: [Fry] Word of the confrontation got back to Donna Heinel at USC,
translation.zh: 对质的消息传回了南加大多纳海涅尔那里

translation.en: and she left a voicemail for Rick Singer cautioning about the situation.
translation.zh: 她给里奇辛格留了一条语音留言警告他注意现在的处境

translation.en: [Heinel] Yeah, hey, Rick, look, I just wanna make sure that,
translation.zh: 是的 嘿 里奇听好 我就想确认一下

translation.en: you know, I don't want the… the parents getting angry
translation.zh: 我不希望…家长发脾气
